name: Personal Budget Optimization
description:
Refine personal budgeting skills to allocate expenses efficiently.
Ensure every dollar has a purpose.

name: Short-Term Investment Plan
description: Set up a short-term investment plan with low-risk options like CDs or treasury bonds to grow savings.

name: Charitable Contributions
description: Begin making regular contributions to charities or causes aligned with personal values.

name: Health Savings Account
description: Open and fund a Health Savings Account (HSA) to save for medical expenses while enjoying tax benefits.

name: Small Emergency Fund Replenishment
description: Replenish a small emergency fund for immediate, unforeseen expenses that might arise.

name: International Investment Exploration
description: Explore international investment opportunities to diversify assets and benefit from global markets.

name: Purchase Investment Property
description: Buy a rental property as a long-term investment to generate passive income.

name: Major Lifestyle Purchase
description: Save and plan for a major lifestyle purchase, such as a dream car or luxury experience.

name: Create a Philanthropic Legacy
description: Establish a trust or foundation to leave a lasting philanthropic impact.

name: Complete Financial Independence
description: Reach full financial independence where passive income fully covers living and discretionary expenses.
